definition: circular finger movement (in playing plucked instrument)/strumming
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: For anybody who bounces, their tremolo will be a problem.
sentences.chinese: 如果谁的右手上下跳动，那么他的轮指一定有问题。

sentences.english: The chakras are related to the seven basic energy centers in the body.
sentences.chinese: 脉轮指的是人体的七个基本的能量中枢。

to indicate the phonetic value of a word using other words
sanxian, large family of 3-stringed plucked musical instruments, with snakeskin covered wooden soundbox and long neck, used in folk music, opera and Chinese orchestra
